Text.Page:
This is a summons from the chief of the Unified Theory Institute in Allemantheia.

Complete this quest to unlock daily quests available from the Unified Theory Institute.

I'm Skeal, chief of the Unified Theory Institute.

I've heard you've been very helpful with our research, so I wanted to thank you in person.

Your contribution to our lab is also a contribution to the Valkyon Federation. I look forward to many great things from you.
